channel.title: Sudo on warrick.io
channel.description: Recent content in Sudo on warrick.io

item.title: Doh! I forgot to sudo.
item.description: I often forget to sudo vim. I make significant changes to the file just to find out that I don’t have permissions to save the file. Well, now that I’ve memorized this little gem it doesn’t matter: :w! sudo tee % The % is a shortcut for the filename. You are really just piping the output through tee to the file - effectively overwriting the contents. Ta-dah!
